Generally clear PERIOD Low 44F PERIOD Winds light and variable PERIOD

Updated November     pm



Things are returning to normal in Durham after two morning scares led authorities to evacuate homes and businesses in central North Carolina PERIOD

A spokeswoman with the Durham Police Department said Tuesday that neither of the suspicious items that authorities went to investigate were a threat PERIOD

Authorities had evacuated homes after someone reported finding a mortar in a yard PERIOD Durham Police spokeswoman Kammie Michael said the mortar was not live PERIOD

A suspicious package found about a mile away from the mortar led authorities to evacuate a building and shut down streets PERIOD Michael says a bomb squad determined the package found in front of a North Carolina Department of Revenue office was not dangerous PERIOD
